subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal won a record 18th Masters title by beating Roger Federer, 6-4, 7-6 (5), in the Madrid final. In the women’s final, Venus Williams was beaten by unseeded Aravane Rezai, 6-2, 7-5.
snippet: Rafael Nadal won a record 18th Masters title by beating Roger Federer, 6-4, 7-6 (5), in the Madrid final. In the women’s final, Venus Williams was beaten by unseeded Aravane Rezai, 6-2, 7-5.
